text: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ مِنَ ٱلْمَآءِ بَشَرًا فَجَعَلَهُۥ نَسَبًا وَصِهْرًا ۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرًا

translation.en.sahih: And it is He who has created from water a human being and made him [a relative by] lineage and marriage. And ever is your Lord competent [concerning creation].
translation.id.indonesian: Dan Dia (pula) yang menciptakan manusia dari air lalu dia jadikan manusia itu (punya) keturunan dan mushaharah dan adalah Tuhanmu Maha Kuasa.
